title: TelemetryConfigurationEvent
description: Schema of all properties of a telemetry configuration event

telemetry_sample_rate.description: The percentage of telemetry events sent

telemetry_configuration_sample_rate.description: The percentage of telemetry configuration events sent after being sampled by telemetry_sample_rate

premium_sample_rate.description: The percentage of sessions with Browser RUM & Session Replay pricing tracked (deprecated in favor of session_replay_sample_rate)

replay_sample_rate.description: The percentage of sessions with Browser RUM & Session Replay pricing tracked (deprecated in favor of session_replay_sample_rate)

session_replay_sample_rate.description: The percentage of sessions with Browser RUM & Session Replay pricing tracked

use_proxy.description: Whether a proxy configured is used

use_before_send.description: Whether beforeSend callback function is used

silent_multiple_init.description: Whether initialization fails silently if the SDK is already initialized

track_session_across_subdomains.description: Whether sessions across subdomains for the same site are tracked

use_cross_site_session_cookie.description: Whether a secure cross-site session cookie is used

use_secure_session_cookie.description: Whether a secure session cookie is used

action_name_attribute.description: Attribute to be used to name actions

use_allowed_tracing_origins.description: Whether the allowed tracing origins list is used

use_excluded_activity_urls.description: Whether the request origins list to ignore when computing the page activity is used

track_views_manually.description: Whether the RUM views creation is handled manually

forward_errors_to_logs.description: Whether console.error logs, uncaught exceptions and network errors are tracked

forward_reports.description: The reports from the Reporting API tracked

track_background_events.description: Whether RUM events are tracked when the application is in Background

mobile_vitals_update_period.description: The period between each Mobile Vital sample (in milliseconds)

track_errors.description: Whether error monitoring & crash reporting is enabled for the source platform

track_network_requests.description: Whether automatic collection of network requests is enabled

track_native_views.description: Whether native views are tracked (for cross platform SDKs)

track_native_errors.description: Whether native error monitoring & crash reporting is enabled (for cross platform SDKs)

track_native_long_tasks.description: Whether long task tracking is performed automatically

track_cross_platform_long_tasks.description: Whether long task tracking is performed automatically for cross platform SDKs

use_attach_to_existing.description: Whether the cross-platform SDK was initialized on top of a pre-existing native SDK instance

use_first_party_hosts.description: Whether the client has provided a list of first party hosts

initialization_type.description: The type of initialization the SDK used, in case multiple are supported

track_flutter_performance.description: Whether Flutter build and raster time tracking is enabled

batch_size.description: The window duration for batches sent by the SDK (in milliseconds)

batch_upload_frequency.description: The upload frequency of batches (in milliseconds)
